channel.title: How do i make moparscape work?
channel.description:
Hello, I have tried everything to try and make Moparscape work, I have Windows Vista (That might be the problem) so whenever I want to try and play it, all my internet pages vanish, including the Moparscape one.
I really appreciate for all your help and I really want to get into the game :D
Cheers.

item.title: How do i make moparscape work?
item.dc:creator: @adventurescape adventurescape
item.description:
@adventurescape wrote:

so you have a vista?
search on your desktop
C:
or just click run and type in C:
then u see runescape cache (if u play rs)
and other caches (if u play runekeep or zzscape or etc.)
then u clear (delete) the moparscape cache,
open up moparisthebest.com,
let the webclient run,
it will redownload the cache again,
then, it might work, reboot ur computer or restart if it doesnt work after what i thought u 

               ~AdventureScape

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make moparscape work?
item.dc:creator: @salar_sobhi1 salar sobhi1
item.description:
@salar_sobhi1 wrote:

Well, I have restarted Java, but it still doesn’t work. I have also re-installed Moparscape to my computer, but it’s still doing the same thing (Exiting the page).

Please help me play the game A.S.A.P =P

Cheers.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 25, 2009, 01:11:38 am[/size][hr]Also another thing, I’ve given my computer a virus scan.

Cheers.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 25, 2009, 01:13:02 am[/size][hr]And, maybe do you think I should go on my administrators account? Might that help?

Cheers.

Read full topic
